basics.name: Vlad Mutilica
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm Vlad. I'm a full stack developer specialized primarily in Java, Python and JavaScript. I am product focused and I strive to prioritize user feedback. My interests lie in Data Science and Optimization. I feel at home working on backend projects. In my spare time I like to explore the ethical side of technology.

work.summary: Financial Technology firm specializing in tailored Salesforce software solutions for customer-centric platforms including Google, IBM and KPMG. My role in the Software Engineering department, involved developing testing and maintaining the SCPQ estimation product, with a particular focus on implementing the innovative Guided Scoping feature. This functionality offers an intuitive interface that translates natural language into SOQL queries and Salesforce flow-actions, significantly improving user efficiency in building and deploying optimized projects. Moreover my role entailed a variety of infrastructure related responsibilities which introduced me to a myriad of languages including but not only python, groovy and ruby. During my time at Certinia I acquired a solid understanding of the agile and fintech background while becoming well versed in Salesforce development (Query Bulkification, CRUD/FLS Security and Unit/Integration Testing).
work.name: Certinia ( formerly FinancialForce )

work.summary: As part of my role as a Junior AEM developer I worked in a team responsible for implementing client websites using Adobe Experience Manager. The stack I worked on was Java based using Spring for dependency management. This placement exposed me to a real life software development environment where I learned valuable skills related to programming and agile methodologies.
work.name: IBM Summer Placement
